org.apache.juneau.httppart

Interface HttpPartParser

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HttpPartParser.Null
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseHttpPartParser, OpenApiParser, SimplePartParser, UonParser, UonParser.Decoding, UrlEncodingParser

    public interface HttpPartParser
    Interface used to convert HTTP headers, query parameters, form-data parameters, and URI path variables to POJOs

    The following default implementations are provided:

    • OpenApiParser - Parts encoded in based on OpenAPI schema.
    • UonParser - Parts encoded in UON notation.
    • SimplePartParser - Parts encoded in plain text.

    Implementations must include either a public no-args constructor or a public constructor that takes in a single PropertyStore object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  HttpPartParser.Null
      Represent "no" part parser.

      • parse

        <T> T parse(HttpPartType partType,
            HttpPartSchema schema,
            String in,
            Class<T> toType)
     throws ParseException,
            SchemaValidationException
        Convenience method for creating a no-arg session and parsing a part.
        Parameters:
        partType - The category of value being parsed.
        schema - Schema information about the part.
        May be null.
        Not all part parsers use the schema information.
        in - The value being parsed.
        toType - The POJO type to transform the input into.
        Returns:
        The parsed value.
        Throws:
        ParseException - Malformed input encountered.
        SchemaValidationException - If the input fails schema validation.
